about_the_game:
EMITIME is a rhythm-based deck-building game - where music is your strategy!

EMITIME combines rhythm, deck builder, and grid-based strategy to create something unique, and enjoyable! Perform attacks and move around the grid to the rhythm and activate your skill cards to defeat enemies!


Future Plans

EMITIME will have a Roguelike Mode which allowing you to replay the game more than one... if not many times! Expand your deck as you meet new enemies on the map!

This game will feature two different characters, each with different movesets!

There will be a story mode where you follow the background story of the two protagonists - Aldrich, a royal engineer from the past, and Albert a farmer combatant from the future! Switch between the two characters and solve puzzles on the map with time travel mechanics!
